title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the QuantumRandomnessGenerator system, including the target use cases, performance metrics, security considerations, and integration with existing systems.

title: Research Quantum Random Number Generation Techniques
description: Investigate and evaluate different quantum-based methods for generating true random numbers, such as quantum optics, quantum vacuum fluctuations, and quantum spin. Assess their feasibility, security, and performance characteristics, focusing on both theoretical aspects and potential practical implementations. Since this task involves significant research and requires a deep understanding of quantum mechanics, it is recommended to involve the code-architect, project-manager, and potentially experts from various domains such as Quantum Physics and Applied Mathematics for guidance and oversight. The aim is to provide a comprehensive analysis that could lead to an informed decision about the best approach for our system. Since this task is in its draft stage, it is open for suggestions and improvements.

title: Design System Architecture for Quantum Randomness Generator
description: Develop the overall architecture for the QuantumRandomnessGenerator system, including the quantum random number generation component, the interface for consuming the random numbers, and any necessary supporting services or infrastructure. The architecture should consider scalability, fault tolerance, security, and performance requirements, with a focus on making the system modular for easy maintenance and extension. Additionally, ensure that the design is compatible with the project's defined scope and requirements, and reflects best practices in the field of quantum computing and cryptography.
dependencies: Research Quantum Random Number Generation Techniques

title: Implement Quantum Random Number Generation
description: Based on the chosen technique, implement the quantum random number generation component, including any necessary hardware or software interfaces.

title: Develop Random Number Consumption Interface
description: Create the interface (e.g., API, library) for consuming the generated random numbers, including any necessary security measures, such as key management and access control.

title: Implement Supporting Services and Infrastructure
description: Develop any necessary supporting services or infrastructure components, such as logging, monitoring, and deployment automation.

title: Conduct Security Audits
description: Perform comprehensive security audits of the QuantumRandomnessGenerator system, including vulnerability assessments, penetration testing, and code reviews.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite for the QuantumRandomnessGenerator system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the correctness and reliability of the system.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation for the QuantumRandomnessGenerator system, including user guides, developer guides, and deployment instructions.

title: Deploy and Monitor
description: Deploy the QuantumRandomnessGenerator system to the production environment, set up monitoring and alerting mechanisms, and establish processes for ongoing maintenance and support.
